Articles.Content:
Hey guys im just here to tell you all i\'m a Sponge bro, and now i\'m going to force sponge bob down everyone throats by making sure I put sponge bob related things in all my posts no matter how irrelevant they are.

Also heres a rocket

Reminds me of the time when my Grandfather called it \'Sponge-cake Bob-pants\'.

On topic, I\'m not sure if this is relevant in general discussion, but you have to remember that not every pony shoves it down your throat. Think of it like religion: some hide it, some subtly show it and others will desperately try and convert you. Even if the entire thing sounds like bollocks to you, it would be wrong to class them all the same.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Please keep the meme image posting to the off-topic forum. Game related images are fine, but meme images just clutter up the regular forums.

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

(Arise my copycat minions!)

(Arise my copycat minions!)

I exercise my right to refuse!

Also welcome Spongebro.

nuqneH hur\'q

Qapla\' gik\'tal

Bekk JupiterII

(For those who can\'t read it; this is as close as I can get to the captain\'s greeting in Klingon.)
